reasoning:
Task breakdown:
1) Navigate to the Hacker News front page (/news) if not already there.
2) Identify the post ranked 12 in the listing.
3) Open its comments thread (typically by clicking the “X comments” link for that item, or clicking the item’s age link which also leads to the item page).

Function usefulness assessment:
- hn_search_from_footer: Not useful. This shortcut performs a footer search and navigates to search results; it does not help locate the 12th-ranked front-page item or open its comments thread.
